turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, how's it going?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey there. What can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping that you could stop by Starbucks and pick up a drink for me? I'd do it myself but I'm just swamped with work at the moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. What would you like me to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be a long day, so I need a lot of caffeine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, Starbucks has you covered there, I'm sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. But I also want something that tastes good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Everything at Starbucks tastes good! That's why everyone goes there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: True. Okay, how about an iced caffe mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Normally I do grande, but I'm going to go with a venti today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That comes with three shots of espresso, plus the chocolate. Should get you going. Did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course. Might as well go all the way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Is two percent milk okay? That's the default.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, do they have almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do. They actually added it to their menu recently.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. I'll go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have an Iced Venti Caffe Mocha with almond milk and whipped cream. Anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the coffee will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. The shop at Ocean Ranch on Golden Lantern and Camino Del Avion is right next to your house. I'm placing the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. I'll go ahead and pick it up and text you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. I'll see you soon.
